name: AI
description: The AI module allows you to integrate with AI services and develop AI applications.

operations.name: addToKnowledge
operations.description: Add text and its embeddings to a selected vector store.

operations.name: getFromKnowledge
operations.description: Search for similar texts in a selected vector store.

connections.name: ANTHROPIC
connections.description: Connection for interacting with the Anthropic AI service.

connections.name: AZURE_OPEN_AI
connections.description: Connection for interacting with the Azure OpenAI service.

connections.name: MISTRAL_AI
connections.description: Connection for interacting with the MistralAI service.

connections.name: DEEPSEEK
connections.description: Connection for interacting with the DeepSeek service.

connections.name: OPEN_AI
connections.description: Connection for interacting with the OpenAI service.

connections.name: MI_VECTOR_STORE
connections.description: Connection for interacting with the MI In-Registry vector store.

connections.name: PINECONE
connections.description: Connection for interacting with the Pinecone vector store.

connections.name: POSTGRES_VECTOR
connections.description: Connection for interacting with the PostgreSQL vector database.

connections.name: CHROMA_DB
connections.description: Connection for interacting with the ChromaDB vector database.

connections.name: POSTGRES_MEMORY
connections.description: Connection for interacting with the PostgreSQL memory database.
